result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael A Miski was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft-False Representation >$10,000, a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(d).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes: Pay all court costs including all applicable surcharges.  If unpaid financial obligations remain at discharge or revocation, civil judgment to be entered.

Obey all of the rules and regulations of supervising probation agent.
*  Pay supervision fees.
*  Pay all court costs including all applicable surcharges.
*  Defendant is ordered to submit to a DNA sample & pay DNA surcharge and notice is given.
*  Pay costs of legal representation or Advocate Counsel fees for the defense of the case, to be determined within 60 days.
*  Pay restitution in the sum of $41,400.00 plus surcharges.
*  Pay extradition costs in the sum of $400.00.
May not have contact with Mike Gifford, Jenna Verbraggen, and Minda LLC.  Not to enter in or participate in any gambling.

records.addlTxt: Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Burgoyne appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody w/Atty Diane Caspari.  Deft stipulates to restitution in the amount of $41,400 & extradition costs of $400.  Victim rights compliance.  Sentencing arguments made.  Deft sentenced to 9yrs WSP; initial confinement of 4yrs followed by 5yrs of ES.  See ES conditions.  Credit for 227 days.  Deft not eligible for CIP or SAP.  Appeal rights.  Firearm warning  Voting acknowledgment.  DNA ordered; notice given to deft.
NMM & Restitution Order submitted but never filed.

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Burgoyne appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody w/Atty Diane Caspari.  Defense reports the case is settled.  Victim rights compliance.  Deft pleads guilty; found guilty by the Court.  PSI ordered.  Sentencing set for 4/1/16 @ 11am.

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Burgoyne appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody w/Atty Diane Caspari.  Defense requests add'l time to speak with federal prosecutors regarding this deft; deft has similar charges pending in (3) or (4) other states with the amount totalling over $200K.  Brief discussion held.  At this point, the court will leave the case on for 2/15/16 @ 9am for status.

*No Contact w/Michael Gifford or Minda LLC Construction Contractors.
943.20(1)(d) -Felony Theft - False Representation

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lehman.  Special Pros K R Wells appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody w/Atty Diane Caspari.  Defense requests an adjournment; deft has similar charges pending in other states.  No objection from the State.  FPT adj to 1/28/16 @ 11am, JS 2/15/16 @ 9am.  Bond amended to $25,000 cash for the reasons set forth on the record.  Same conditions.
